document_data.name: Hajima sitt-Nasir
document_data.mainbody: '''Hajima sitt-Nasir''' was a [[Zakhara]]n [[elf]] leader of the [[Sirocco]] riders in the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Hajima was a woman known for her curiosity and charismatic leadership. She appreciated luxury items that could make the lives of her clan better and always sought news from outside of the Great Desert.
document_data.Possessions: Hajima wielded an [[enchanted]] ''+4'' [[scimitar]] and well as a [[light lance]] and a [[jambiya]].
document_data.History: In the mid-14{{th}} century DR, Hajima sitt-Nasir led the Sirocco, a mercenary rider, fighter, and scout group composed of [[human]]s, [[dwarves]], and elves from Zakhara. The Sirocco ended up taking missions in the [[Shaar]] and in the [[Old Empires]] regions but eventually moved to the Great Desert of [[Anauroch]], where they, under Hajima's leadership, offering protection services to the caravans moving across the hot sands.
